@@ -38,25 +38,94 @@ under the License. See the LICENSE and NOTICE files included in each artifact for additional license information.

-

Use the links below to download a source distribution of Apache Syncope. +

Use the links below to download a distribution of Apache Syncope. It is good practice to verify the integrity of the distribution files.

-
-
-

- Note that the preferred way to work with Apache Syncope is to - generate a Maven project - starting from published archetype. -

-

- If evaluating Apache Syncope, the simplest way is via the - standalone distribution. -

-
-
+ +
    +
  • Evaluating? Standalone distribution
    • +
  • Building your own IdM solution? +
      +
    • GUI lover? + Use the installer +
      • +
    • Prefer CLI? + Generate a Maven project +
      • +
    +
    • +
  • Deploying on Debian GNU / Linux - Ubuntu?
    • +
+
+ +

Release date: ???

+

+ Release notes +

+ + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + +
ArtifactSignatures
+ syncope-1.2.0-M1-source-release.zip + + asc + md5 + sha1 +
+ syncope-standalone-1.2.0-M1-distribution.zip + + asc + md5 + sha1 +
+ syncope-installer-1.2.0-M1.jar + + asc + md5 + sha1 +
+ apache-syncope-1.2.0-M1.deb + + asc + md5 + sha1 +
+ apache-syncope-console-1.2.0-M1.deb + + asc + md5 + sha1 +
+

Release date: Jul 3rd, 2014

@@ -223,57 +223,70 @@ cd ]]>
    +
  1. + Staging artifacts + +cd + +cp $SYNCOPE_RELEASE_DIR/target/syncope-*-source-release.zip . +cp $SYNCOPE_RELEASE_DIR/target/syncope-*-source-release.zip.asc . +cp $SYNCOPE_RELEASE_DIR/standalone/target/syncope-standalone-*-distribution.zip . +cp $SYNCOPE_RELEASE_DIR/standalone/target/syncope-standalone-*-distribution.zip.asc . +# only for 1_2_X +cp $SYNCOPE_RELEASE_DIR/installer/target/syncope-installer-*.jar . +cp $SYNCOPE_RELEASE_DIR/installer/target/syncope-installer-*.jar.asc . +cp $SYNCOPE_RELEASE_DIR/deb/core/target/apache-syncope-*.deb . +cp $SYNCOPE_RELEASE_DIR/deb/core/target/apache-syncope-*.deb.asc . +cp $SYNCOPE_RELEASE_DIR/deb/console/target/apache-syncope-console-*.deb . +cp $SYNCOPE_RELEASE_DIR/deb/console/target/apache-syncope-console-*.deb.asc . + +for file in `find . -name '*.deb' -or -name '*.jar' -or -name '*.zip'`; do + openssl md5 $file | sed 's/.*= //' > $file.md5 + openssl sha1 $file | sed 's/.*= //' > $file.sha1 +done + +cd .. +svn add +svn commit -m "Staging artifacts for vote"]]> +
  2. Staging site -

  3. - From the directory where you have launched release:prepare execute (this step will create a maven - staging repository): + From $SYNCOPE_RELEASE_DIR execute (this step will create a maven staging repository): mvn -P apache-release release:perform [-Duser.name=<your_apache_uid>]
